Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","Excellent quality very very mild and works like a charm for dry hair. Quality feels premium and have nice fragrance overall value for money. Bought after watching fit tuber :- I got the conditioner in free giveaway on sale. It was a great deal. What an refreshing smell both the products have. Shampoo has little thick but flowable consistency. I bought it after the recommendation of fituber,a youtuber. As well it is total natural product will almost zero additives and preservatives. Therefore it's price is on higher side. Do a patch test as it's not necessary that all natural would suit everyone. Result:- it doesn't dry out hair after washing. Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

Enriched with Nutrilock Actives, our shampoo for hair fall immediately helps seal cuticles and strengthens strands to help minimize hair fall due to breakages, leaving them looking fuller.

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

India","#Benign shanpoo for hair.  i had suffered from hair fall  than i bought this product on recommendation from a my friend. i have been using it since 2 week and now my hair is ameliorating fastly and new hair grow with back shiny a as well as healthy. it's fragrance so good.#How to use it . (1) apply dim sized portion of shampoo to hair and gently massage into scalp. (2) apply it twice in a week (3) this is all type hair nad very greatfully for damage hair. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. Can't say much about its hair growth claim, but definitely, it decreased the hair fall intensity. As I have used just for 6 times, but there is slight decrement in hair fall. Also, it does not make scalp dry. So i think you should give a try, especially to those who have hair fall problem. I cut one star for its MRP of 999, as it seems too costly. But in lightening deal, you can get it for 699, which is somewhat good. Overall, but very good except its price....",STBOTANICA4.7

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

column2: 1","I used biotique for a quote long time, used some of the variants like neem margosa, bio green and bio kelp. It made my scalp so dry that dandruff is on my scalp right after bath..i tried washing my hair again and again with cold water also, but ntng actually helped me. Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. India","It's really a sulphate free hair friendly product..!! As there is no Sulphates the lather formation will be of course poor.. So keep that in mind.. Question is do you want lather at the cost of your Baldness or Good strong hair without lather formation..I want to clarify it more properly.. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Doesn't leave the hair sticky or too dry. Good fragrance. No unwanted chemicals used making it safer to use. Usually while getting up in morning my hair used to sticky/tangled conditions but used this at night the next it was amazing.Would really recommend the products of WOW to anyone.And thanks to Flipkart for having such great products and delivering those with great packaging and on time... :- Product is quite good, but fragrance is not as good as the apple cider vinegar one which i had previously used but that's good.It does it's work well, hair becomes shiny and smooth.Will give more details after long time use.",BodyCupid4.5

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. India","#Benign shanpoo for hair.  i had suffered from hair fall  than i bought this product on recommendation from a my friend. i have been using it since 2 week and now my hair is ameliorating fastly and new hair grow with back shiny a as well as healthy. it's fragrance so good.#How to use it . (1) apply dim sized portion of shampoo to hair and gently massage into scalp. (2) apply it twice in a week (3) this is all type hair nad very greatfully for damage hair. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. Can't say much about its hair growth claim, but definitely, it decreased the hair fall intensity. As I have used just for 6 times, but there is slight decrement in hair fall. Also, it does not make scalp dry. So i think you should give a try, especially to those who have hair fall problem. I cut one star for its MRP of 999, as it seems too costly. But in lightening deal, you can get it for 699, which is somewhat good. Overall, but very good except its price....",STBOTANICA4.7

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

India","It's really a sulphate free hair friendly product..!! As there is no Sulphates the lather formation will be of course poor.. So keep that in mind.. Question is do you want lather at the cost of your Baldness or Good strong hair without lather formation..I want to clarify it more properly.. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Doesn't leave the hair sticky or too dry. Good fragrance. No unwanted chemicals used making it safer to use. Usually while getting up in morning my hair used to sticky/tangled conditions but used this at night the next it was amazing.Would really recommend the products of WOW to anyone.And thanks to Flipkart for having such great products and delivering those with great packaging and on time... :- Product is quite good, but fragrance is not as good as the apple cider vinegar one which i had previously used but that's good.It does it's work well, hair becomes shiny and smooth.Will give more details after long time use.",BodyCupid4.5

1",It is good to some extent. I have short and medium thick hair. And not very oily or dry scalp. It worked sometime. When I used a small amount of this shampoo that surprisingly made more of a difference than using normal amount of usual shampoo that u would use. Guess it depends on your scalp. But it did not keep dandruff off much. It goes better as a normal shampoo than an anti dandruff shampoo. :- The bottle is very small. It's good because it helped me to understand how it would react with my hair. The lather may/may not be formed. But it makes the hair soft and silky. Hair might be a bit oily after shampoo. The effect I seen after 1-2 days. :- Really in love with this shampoo. Suits my hair type so well. Love the fragrance so mild. A little amount is enough to use. The best part is its  totally organic no harsh chemicals at all.,JustHerbs4.6

India","#Benign shanpoo for hair.  i had suffered from hair fall  than i bought this product on recommendation from a my friend. i have been using it since 2 week and now my hair is ameliorating fastly and new hair grow with back shiny a as well as healthy. it's fragrance so good.#How to use it . (1) apply dim sized portion of shampoo to hair and gently massage into scalp. (2) apply it twice in a week (3) this is all type hair nad very greatfully for damage hair. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. India","this is the 2nd purchase of st botanical shampoo .this time I m searching for anti dandruff treatment that's why I choose this variant.the product is nice but nt that much excellent as argan oil shampoo.to be honest it is not effective for oily dandruff &hair shaft will be little bit dry after wash.but it relieves from itching &can be useful for flaky scalp.the strong smell can be irritating for some people.overall it is an OK product.but I loved the argan oil shampoo more than this.but defin... :- With the goodness of eucalyptus oil and Tea tree oil, this shampoo provides great protection from dandruff and dry itchy scalp. It cleanses the hair and scalp and provides cooling and calming effects.The solution/shampoo is thick enough to rest nicely on your palm before applying it on the hair. Very hearty and organic smell to it. Not too strong though. It forms enough foam while applying on the hair. It's quite light-weight but it has an amazing strength to give your hair some volume. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Usually while getting up in morning my hair used to sticky/tangled conditions but used this at night the next it was amazing.Would really recommend the products of WOW to anyone.And thanks to Flipkart for having such great products and delivering those with great packaging and on time... :- Product is quite good, but fragrance is not as good as the apple cider vinegar one which i had previously used but that's good.It does it's work well, hair becomes shiny and smooth.Will give more details after long time use.",BodyCupid4.5

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

1","Bought this product from the reference of fituber, as he claimed that it is totally free of harsh chemicals. It is really nice. It has improved texture of my hairs and hairfall has also decreased with one month use of it. Nice product by khadi. For dandruff, i have very heavy dandruff. So it doesn't remove all of that. But for mild to medium dandruff it is perfect. :- I have using since 3 year's khadi shampoo ( Amla bhringaraj) this time I switched khadi neem aloevera both are just amazing this Neem aloevera shampoo makes your hair so soft and silky ,,,,, just go for it don't think to much this is a honest review ,,, everyone has a different types of hair. but for me this is best shampoo .my hair types is dry :- I want to give a genuine feedback about this one - This shampoo is damn good guys.. this's the right pick for the one who suffers a lot from white flakes prob also heavy dandruff.. believe me guys, this one has solved my problem after 3 to 4 weeks of  normal use..  I was heavily affected by white flakes for nearly 5 years..after searching a lot I got its attention..  now no prob.. in my personal try I realized that applying oil before bath or last night before sleeping will pay off greatly..",Khadi Natural Healthcare4.7

India","It's really a sulphate free hair friendly product..!! As there is no Sulphates the lather formation will be of course poor.. So keep that in mind.. Question is do you want lather at the cost of your Baldness or Good strong hair without lather formation..I want to clarify it more properly.. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Doesn't leave the hair sticky or too dry. Good fragrance. No unwanted chemicals used making it safer to use. Usually while getting up in morning my hair used to sticky/tangled conditions but used this at night the next it was amazing.Would really recommend the products of WOW to anyone.And thanks to Flipkart for having such great products and delivering those with great packaging and on time... :- Product is quite good, but fragrance is not as good as the apple cider vinegar one which i had previously used but that's good.It does it's work well, hair becomes shiny and smooth.Will give more details after long time use.",BodyCupid4.5

Say goodbye to dullness, and hello to shine!
Softer, shinier, and healthier-looking hair is what this creamy, nourishing shampoo is all about. Enriched with Coconut Milk & Pea Peptide!

‚Ä¢ Coconut Milk ‚Äì An ingredient that is rich in lipids (blend of fatty acids) and filled with vitamins, coconut milk helps enhance hair‚Äôs natural shine and restores hair moisture. Being rich in fatty acids, coconut has a high affinity for hair proteins & because of its low molecular weight, it can penetrate the hair shaft and keeps hair healthy and moisturised
‚Ä¢ Pea Peptide ‚Äì They are short chains of amino acids which act as building blocks of proteins like keratin in the hair. They help strengthen hair and smoothen out strands as well.","Applied For

India","#Benign shanpoo for hair.  i had suffered from hair fall  than i bought this product on recommendation from a my friend. i have been using it since 2 week and now my hair is ameliorating fastly and new hair grow with back shiny a as well as healthy. it's fragrance so good.#How to use it . (1) apply dim sized portion of shampoo to hair and gently massage into scalp. (2) apply it twice in a week (3) this is all type hair nad very greatfully for damage hair. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. Can't say much about its hair growth claim, but definitely, it decreased the hair fall intensity. As I have used just for 6 times, but there is slight decrement in hair fall. India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

India","It's really a sulphate free hair friendly product..!! As there is no Sulphates the lather formation will be of course poor.. So keep that in mind.. Question is do you want lather at the cost of your Baldness or Good strong hair without lather formation..I want to clarify it more properly.. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Doesn't leave the hair sticky or too dry. Good fragrance. No unwanted chemicals used making it safer to use. Usually while getting up in morning my hair used to sticky/tangled conditions but used this at night the next it was amazing.Would really recommend the products of WOW to anyone.And thanks to Flipkart for having such great products and delivering those with great packaging and on time... :- Product is quite good, but fragrance is not as good as the apple cider vinegar one which i had previously used but that's good.It does it's work well, hair becomes shiny and smooth.Will give more details after long time use.",BodyCupid4.5

India","#Benign shanpoo for hair.  i had suffered from hair fall  than i bought this product on recommendation from a my friend. i have been using it since 2 week and now my hair is ameliorating fastly and new hair grow with back shiny a as well as healthy. it's fragrance so good.#How to use it . (1) apply dim sized portion of shampoo to hair and gently massage into scalp. (2) apply it twice in a week (3) this is all type hair nad very greatfully for damage hair. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. Can't say much about its hair growth claim, but definitely, it decreased the hair fall intensity. As I have used just for 6 times, but there is slight decrement in hair fall. India","This is my second time purchase of this product and I just love it. It does what it claims all that we should give is just time to get it work. See as a customer I want to say something that nothing will change anything just in one night we should do our efforts and should give time to get the perfect results and am using this product more than two months as of now and trust me it is making the difference in my hair fall. Not instantly but gradually controlling my hair fall for some extent an... :- Positive reviews deceived me and I wasted my money yet again for it's sulphate & parabens free gimmick. But it's no good on my hair. India","It's really a sulphate free hair friendly product..!! As there is no Sulphates the lather formation will be of course poor.. So keep that in mind.. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Doesn't leave the hair sticky or too dry. Good fragrance. No unwanted chemicals used making it safer to use. India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7

India","It's really a sulphate free hair friendly product..!! As there is no Sulphates the lather formation will be of course poor.. So keep that in mind.. Question is do you want lather at the cost of your Baldness or Good strong hair without lather formation..I want to clarify it more properly.. Lather formation occurs on 3rd wash..!!Steps to follow:take a small mug type thing in which you can dilute your (5-6times pressed out amount for men) shampoo in that mug with Warm or hot water of gyser..... :- Pretty damn good shaampoo. Doesn't leave the hair sticky or too dry. Good fragrance. No unwanted chemicals used making it safer to use. Usually while getting up in morning my hair used to sticky/tangled conditions but used this at night the next it was amazing.Would really recommend the products of WOW to anyone.And thanks to Flipkart for having such great products and delivering those with great packaging and on time... :- Product is quite good, but fragrance is not as good as the apple cider vinegar one which i had previously used but that's good.It does it's work well, hair becomes shiny and smooth.Will give more details after long time use.",BodyCupid4.5

(1) apply dim sized portion of shampoo to hair and gently massage into scalp. (2) apply it twice in a week (3) this is all type hair nad very greatfully for damage hair. (4) apply it continuously without tak... :- I have thin hair and I use volumising products for my hair.I bought this on recommendation from a friend.I have used it for a week now and I am very happy with the results. My hair have gained volume and shine in such a short period only. I don't need additional products for my hair !The shampoo is with out harmful chemicals and I use it on alternate days as the hot and humid weather makes my hair sticky and I can use it frequently without a worry.I was in two minds looking at the price ... :- I feel it is good for my hair. Also, it does not make scalp dry. So i think you should give a try, especially to those who have hair fall problem. I cut one star for its MRP of 999, as it seems too costly. India","I purchased this product for my wife. She has started using this Pro keratin & Argan oil shampoo almost 3 weeks back. Before I share my review on this product, I must say my wife has some really dry hair and unfortunately her journalism work demands her to travel a lot, which exposes her to dust, dirt, pollution and what not! Just video chatting with her last night, I noticed her hair quality has shown some good changes and asked her about it, and she said she is using this shampoo and likin... :- I've been using it along with the conditioner with the same name. They should be used together for best results. I've attached a picture to show the difference in their feel and colour. The shampoo is thinner and off white while the conditioner is creamier.Pros - = It is made from amazing ingredients like Argan Oil, Bhringraj Oil and Sweet Almond Oil. It's chemical free too. = It effectively cleans the hair and makes them smooth. = The smell lasts long. = It feels premium and should be ... :- This is the first time I am using this product. It was available in neat package arrived at time. Comparing with other shampoos, this extremely suited my hair well. No frizz,  good smell and easy to use. I get headache and hair fall whenever I use other shampoos, but this one proved me wrong. It retains moisture in the scalp. No sulphate and parabens. So very safe to use and an user friendly. The cost was a bit more, but comparing it's quality and other sulphate free shampoos St. Botanica is ...",STBOTANICA4.7
